MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G67 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4.00pm to safely carry out repairs to an underground mains fault outside hillcrest court and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:15pm on Sunday, 20 December 2020
